post.body: get on skype! i miss you times 264847967654!
thanks for the package!
Home now. So tired. Ordered pizza cuz I cant be fucked cooking. Early night for me. Happy new years rest of world. Short sentences.
Coming home. Rhythm and Vines, BW Campgrounds and Gisborne itself were amazing. Fun fun fun.
Best. New Years. Ever.
About to see Flava Flav IN THE FLESH!
We were packed into a tiny area for hours. It rained, people were slipping over and getting stood on. :(
It was scary. People were crying and pushing... The crowd was about to riot.
Rhythm and Vines turned into a refugee camp when tens of thousands of people showed up for buses that weren't there.
Its 230pm. Im drunk MIA is blasting thru stadium spekrs. Im in a semiexposed shower. I'm not alone. Hehe...,
No one here has worn shoes in days. @jessums31 's dream come true.
too much vodka. Party scarv Lol
I smell like a mix of sweat, sunscreen, salt, sand and vodka. Summer music festival anyone?
Just saw a 'Beached As' shirt. It was lol.
Wow. NZ is pretty.
I will be joining the cast of Beachlands in the new year. Nanisnap, actor?
Well, farewell internet. I will see you in a week! Behave yourself while I'm gone, don't make a mess and always wear clean underwear. <3
Audition and then road trip to Rhythm and Vines festival for new years. What a busy day. So little time...
It's 1am and I'm just starting to pack for a week long trip. Fuck.
Got home late, have got nothing ready for my early start tomorrow! Camping ftl?
